com.movlad.pcl.io

Class PointCloudWriter<PointT extends Point>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.pcl.io.PointCloudWriter<PointT>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PointCloud3dWriter

    public abstract class PointCloudWriter<PointT extends Point>
extends Object
    Writes generic PointCloud<?> to files (e.g. PCD, PLY)
    Author:
    Vlad-Adrian Moglan

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public final void write(String fileName)
        Parameters:
        fileName - must contain a .pcd or .ply extension to indicate the output file format to the program.

      • write

        public final void write(String fileName,
                        boolean binaryMode)
        Parameters:
        fileName - must contain a .pcd or .ply extension to indicate the output format to the program.
        binaryMode - if false, the file is written in ASCII format.

      • write

        public final void write(String fileName,
                        FileFormat format)
        Parameters:
        fileName - can be any output file path.
        format - determines the format of the file (PCD, PLY).

      • write

        public final void write(String fileName,
                        boolean binaryMode,
                        FileFormat format)
        Parameters:
        fileName - can be any output path.
        binaryMode - if false, the file is written in ASCII format.
        format - determines the format of the file (e.g. PCD, PLY).

      • writePCD

        protected abstract void writePCD(String fileName,
                                 PointCloud<PointT> cloud,
                                 boolean binaryMode)
        Native implementation - writes a cloud to a PCD file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - can be any output path.
        cloud - to be written
        binaryMode - if false, the file is written in ASCII format.
